pageSize.tooBig: pageSize should be less or equal to 2147483647.

pageIndex.negative: pageIndex should be equal to -1 or greater than 0
pageIndex.tooBig: pageIndex should be less or equal to 2147483647.

sortOrder.invalid: sortOrder should be an element of asc,desc.

sortColumn.invalidForDevelop: sortColumn should be an element of challengename,reviewstart,reviewend,challengetype,reviewtype,numberofsubmissions,numberofreviewpositionsavailable.
sortColumn.invalidForDesign: sortColumn should be an element of challengename,round2scheduledstartdate,round1scheduledstartdate,reviewtype,reviewer.

challengeType.invalidForDevelop: The challengeType parameter is not a correct project category value.
challengeType.invalidForDesign: The challengeType parameter is not a correct project category value.

reviewType.invalidDevelop: reviewType should be an element of iterative review,spec review,contest review.
reviewType.invalidDesign: reviewType should be an element of screening,spec review

reviewStartDate.missingType: reviewStartDate.type should be an element of AFTER,AFTER_CURRENT_DATE,BEFORE,BEFORE_CURRENT_DATE,BETWEEN_DATES,ON.
reviewStartDate.invalidFormat: Invalid reviewStartDate.firstDate. Expected format is MM.DD.YYYY
reviewStartDate.missingSecondDate: Invalid reviewStartDate.secondDate. Expected format is MM.DD.YYYY
